column4: how do i get out of screen? i have irssi running in it andi  screen -x back into it when ever i want...how do i get out leaving irssi still running?
do you want to detach screen? or really terminate it?
ctrl-a d to detach, screen -r to reattach, ctrl-a k to kill. if that was the question.
to gently exit screen, just exit all applications running inside it
